page.title: 04VILLAGE LIFE LIVERTON
page.content: EXTRACTS OF VILLAGE LIFE BY{LISA {PEARCE,HELEN CORNISH,CARON GREENWOOD. I live in{Summerhill Cresent}in{ {Liverton.}It is a very quiet place. We have vans that come around like the fruit and veg, the milk lady, the bread man-all kinds of vans. I like it because it is not busy and noisy. I live in{Liverton Village.}We have a village shop to get little bits of food we have missed during the week. You can never really get bored for on Thursdays there is a childrens club that all the children of the village can go to. And for the Mums and Dads there is bingo on Monday nights. I live in{Liverton}and my nearest super market is{Trago Mills.}My road is very peaceful but Trago is going to build a new one near Benedicks Garage; that means our road is going to be busy and dangerous.
